description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $10.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with 529040 Ontario and 880382. The average
  contract duration was 1.01 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.5M. The longest
  contract was 5.23 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $19.8M.
